title: T206 Casey Cycle , Geyer Tolstoi both PSA 3 Reduced Price
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: T206 Casey Cycle , Geyer Tolstoi both PSA 3 Reduced Price
posts.post_content:
T206 Casey Montreal Minor Leaguer with a Cycle 350 back PSA 3. This was graded before they had the half grade designation $100.00

T206 Geyer with a Tolstoi back PSA 3. This was also graded before the half grade designation. $100.00



Both look very nice for a 3. Shipping and delivery confirmation
